Home / Interviews / Interviews by Conference / ChicagoWebConf 2012

ChicagoWebConf 2012

ChicagoWebConf 2012 brings together 9 interviews from 2012. Recurring themes include conference speaking and presentation skills, developer education and learning, and open source and project maintenance. Featured interviewees include Aaron Kalin, Andy Lester, JC Grubbs, and Joe Hirn.

  • Coverage: 9 interviews from 2012.
  • Featured interviewees: Aaron Kalin, Andy Lester, JC Grubbs, Joe Hirn, and Jonathan Baltz.
  • Common themes: conference speaking and presentation skills, developer education and learning, open source and project maintenance, web development and frontend practice, and moderating conference panels and discussions.

Trusted Sources

Notable Contributors

  • Andy Lester Interview
Interview with Kumar McMillan at ChicagoWebConf 2012
Interviewee: Kumar McMillan
Topic: web development and frontend practice
Uploaded: May 13, 2022
Conference: ChicagoWebConf 2012
View Interview Watch on Youtube
ugtastic interview kumar-mcmillan conference chicago-web-conf chicagowebconf-2012 web-development-and-frontend-practice web
Video description: Kumar McMillan works for the Mozilla Foundation for the team working to create the Mozilla OS. Kumar talks a bit about working with large, distributed teams with many volunteers collaborating with paid engineers to create a potential competitor to the Android and iOS phone operating systems.
